original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2506)@</color>  武將召喚九顆守護星辰，當武將體力歸零時，回復50%的體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2506)@</color> The military commander summons nine guardian stars. When the military commander's physical strength returns to zero, he will restore 100% of his physical strength .
